name: Hit Frogs Get Paid
description:
You drive a car. On your commute you earn extra income by aiming ever so slightly at frogs. Dont you worry. State officials have ensured us that these particular frogs are evil. 

You drive by using your keyboard, either you use WS or your Arrow Keys. Its entirely up to you. Your choice. Just make sure to never talk to the frogs. They are deceptive and lie!
